text:
Optiver Amsterdam

Core Software Developer | ONSITE | Visa Sponsorship | C++, Python, Linux

We are looking for engineers who are inquisitive and want to know how the systems work; cpus, memory, i/o and networks are familiar territory. People who have a knack for breaking down complex problems into structured elements. Advocates of simplicity.

https://www.optiver.com/eu/en/job-opportunities/eu-510830

Feel free to email me at catiasousa@optiver.com
